|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -HC1 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;Exynos 5422;(5 Octa); |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1_type2 = ARMv7 |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L512EMI-10G; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 933 MHz |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;PoP; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8153; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1E:06
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.05;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.44-56;Ubuntu 16.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink, |addchip = USB 3.1 to SATA 6Gb/s Bridge Controller;JMicron;JMS578;;1;,,, Simple 5V eFuse Protection Switch;TI;TPS259251;;1;,,, PMIC for 2.7-5.0V;Samsung;S2MPS11;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== RAM is LPDDR3 PoP with processor
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Exynos'' 5422 (5 Octa) :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz + :4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :SATA3 via USB3 Bridge *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @933MHz
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/08/21/hardkernel-odroid-hc1-home-cloud-one-stackable-nas-is-now-available-for-49/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-HC1 Home Cloud One Stackable NAS is now available for $49'' on '''CnxSoft''']
==See also== *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel Celeron'' J4105 4-cores @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU
